description: Continued fraction for cube root of 3.
references: H. P. Robinson, Letter to N. J. A. Sloane, Nov 13 1973.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
S. Lang and H. Trotter, Continued fractions for some algebraic numbers, J. Reine Angew. Math. 255 (1972), 112-134.
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(3^(1/3)); for (n=1, 20000, write("b002946.txt", n, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 08 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A002581 = Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, May 08 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
